General.Name: Maplebear Inc.
General.Description: Maplebear Inc., doing business as Instacart, engages in the provision of online grocery shopping services to households in North America. Its service can be provided through company's mobile application or website. The company also provides advertising services; and software-as-a-service solutions. Maplebear Inc., was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 50 Beale Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94105

5.Name: Ms. Lisa  Blackwood-Kapral
